intro: Meet Manas Patel, a talented Software Engineer with a passion for building elegant and efficient web applications. Originally from Sundargarh, Manas currently calls Bangalore home. He attended Orissa Engineering College where he honed his skills and began his journey as a Frontend Developer. With 7 years of experience in the field, Manas has worked for some of the most reputable companies in the industry including TCS, CISCO, Walmart, and Coinbase. His extensive skill set includes proficiency in various programming languages and technologies such as React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML/CSS, Angular, Python, Node, SQL, MongoDB, and AWS. Manas' expertise in Frontend Development and Web Technologies is unparalleled, and his passion for the field is apparent in the quality of his work. He is known for his attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and ability to create visually stunning user interfaces. When he's not immersed in coding, Manas enjoys playing cricket, experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen, travelling and exploring rare food cuisines.
